-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Chart A

```{r include = FALSE}
data("rest_inspec")


rest_inspec =
  rest_inspec %>%
  filter(grade %in% c("A", "B", "C"), boro != "Missing") %>% 
  mutate(boro = str_to_title(boro))


rest_inspec %>% 
  group_by(boro, grade) %>% 
  summarize(n = n()) %>% 
  spread(key = grade, value = n)

```

```{r echo=FALSE}
plot1 = 
  rest_inspec %>% 
    ggplot(aes(x = boro, fill = grade)) +
    geom_bar(position = "dodge") +
    theme_minimal() 

ggplotly(plot1)
```
